emails.subject: Important: Verify Your Account Information
emails.content:
Dear Customer,

We noticed irregular activities on your account. Please verify your account details immediately by clicking the link below. Failure to do so may result in temporary suspension.

Verify Now

Thank you,
Your Bank Security Team

emails.subject: Unusual Activity Detected in Your Account
emails.content:
Hello,

We detected an unusual sign-in attempt to your PayPal account. For your security, please review your recent transactions and secure your account by following the link below:

Review Activity

Sincerely,
PayPal Security

emails.subject: Security Alert: Suspicious Sign-in Attempt
emails.content:
Dear User,

We detected a sign-in attempt from an unknown device. If this wasn't you, please click the link below to secure your account immediately.

Secure Now

Regards,
Microsoft Account Team
